attributes.action: Launch an inquiry into grooming gangs in the U.K
attributes.additional_details: Any crimes such as those committed are horrific, and any potential mishandling or inaction to serve a political agenda, or to possibly shield guilty parties is wholly unacceptable, and those involved need to be held accountable. Although i have no personal affiliation to the victims, i say this...To those 364 who voted Against, what if it was your Daughter, Granddaughter, Sister, Niece??
attributes.background: Launch an inquiry into grooming gangs in the U.K, as well as investigating mishandling of intelligence, potential coercion of Police or Local Authorities to "look the other way" to avoid inflaming tensions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
